com.apriori.concurrent

Interface ListenableScheduledExecutorService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.concurrent.Executor, java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService, ListenableExecutorService, java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScheduledTaskManager

    public interface ListenableScheduledExecutorService
extends ListenableExecutorService, java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService
    A scheduled executor service that returns ListenableFutures.
